chapter.title: Docbook Information
chapter.para: This documentation was created using Docbook and the XML editor XMLmind. To use XMLmind:

listitem.para: If Java is already installed on your system, download and install the standard edition of XMLmind free of charge here. If you do not have Java, you can download the standard edition bundled with Java.

chapter.para: The VE-Suite documentation was created as a modular document separated by chapter. To create a new chapter, choose "Chapter (part of modular document)" from the "New" menu.
User guides and online help for XMLmind can be found here.
